---
title: "Copy Output Test"
jupyter: python3
---

## Text Output Cell

This cell produces text output that can be copied to clipboard.

```{python}
#| label: text-cell
print("Copy me to clipboard!")
print("Second line of text")
```

## Plot Output Cell

This cell produces a plot that can be copied as an image.

```{python}
#| label: plot-cell
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(4, 3))
plt.bar(['A', 'B', 'C'], [3, 7, 2])
plt.title('Test Chart')
plt.show()
```

## Mixed Output Cell

This cell produces both text and plot output. The plot should be copied.

```{python}
#| label: mixed-cell
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

print("This text should NOT be copied")
print("The plot below should be copied instead")

plt.figure(figsize=(4, 3))
plt.plot([1, 2, 3, 4], [1, 4, 2, 3])
plt.title('Mixed Output Chart')
plt.show()
```
